abstract: Whatever the election outcome, the Federal Reserve is widely expected to take new steps this week to spur the nation’s snail-paced recovery.
snippet: Whatever the election outcome, the Federal Reserve is widely expected to take new steps this week to spur the nation’s snail-paced recovery.
lead_paragraph: Everyone on Wall Street is waiting on the Fed.

headline.main: Awaiting Fed’s Plans, Markets Are in Limbo
headline.print_headline: Awaiting Fed’s Plans, The Markets Are in Limbo
